definition: to cast (pour metal into a mold)
to cast in metal/(fig.) to forge/to fashion

sentences.english: Cast the aluminium alloy outer cover , gushes out and moulds on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 铸铝合金外壳压制成型，表面喷塑。

sentences.english: The methods of improving cast-rolling strip are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 提出了改善铸轧带坯质量的措施。

sentences.english: Development and Application of Continuous Rolling Mill Set for Round Aluminum Pole in Qingtongxia Aluminum Group Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 电工圆铝杆连铸连轧机组在我公司的发展应用。

sentences.english: The principal processes and physical metallurgy of direct connection of continuous casting-hot rolling technology is reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了连铸连轧的基本方式及其金属学特点。

sentences.english: The possibility of transverse corner cracking in slab of peritectic carbon steel is greater than that of other carbon steels.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了影响包晶碳钢角横裂的连铸工艺操作和设备。

sentences.english: No man loves his fetters be they made of gold.
sentences.chinese: 即使脚镣黄金铸，无人爱上这刑具。
铸铝合金外客，表面喷塑。

sentences.english: At the same time the theoritical difference between cast sintering and cast infiltrating was analysed.
sentences.chinese: 指出铸造烧结与铸渗原理是不同的。

sentences.english: And he cast four rings for the four ends of the grate of brass， to be places for the staves.
sentences.chinese: 为铜网的四角铸四个环子，作为穿杠的用处。

sentences.english: The billet crack breakout would take place often in the process of continuous casting.
sentences.chinese: 铸坯裂纹漏钢在连铸生产过程中经常发生。

sentences.english: In this paper the on-line real-time detecting system of molder surface temperature of continuous casting is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了连铸铸坯表面温度在线实时测量系统。

sentences.english: They cast bronze rings to hold the poles for the four corners of the bronze grating.
sentences.chinese: 为铜网的四角铸四个环子，作为穿杠的用处。

sentences.english: Prof. Wen has also made a significant contribution to promote the development of the discipline of tribology.
sentences.chinese: 温诗铸教授为推动本学科的发展作出了重大贡献。

sentences.english: Sloping twin-spar frame in thin wall box section cast aluminium, with reinforcement cross-ribbing.
sentences.chinese: 坡双梁框架薄壁箱节铸铝，以加强跨罗纹。

sentences.english: The great love warms the weak heart of patients.
sentences.chinese: 大爱春风暖人心，妙手仁心铸英魂。

definition: to cast (pour metal into a mold)
to cast in metal/(fig.) to forge/to fashion
to engrave (on wood or stone)/to inscribe
